title: You can't git clone a team
summary: The text discusses the challenges of marketing oneself as a generalist in the tech industry. The author argues that employers often look for specialists who are perfectly suited to their needs, and that trying to market oneself as a generalist can be seen as lacking experience or expertise. The author suggests that the best way to market oneself is to focus on building a strong network and gaining experience in a specific area of expertise. They also suggest that it is important to be able to have a conversation about any topic that the interviewer is interested in, as this can help to demonstrate confidence and expertise.
